memberSignatures.value: public BinarySerializerBuilder (System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection<Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinarySerializerBuilderCase> cases = null, Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinaryCodec codec = null, Chr.Avro.Resolution.ITypeResolver resolver = null);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<class Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinarySerializerBuilderCase> cases, class Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinaryCodec codec, class Chr.Avro.Resolution.ITypeResolver resolver) cil managed

parameters.name: cases
parameters.summary:
An optional collection of cases. If no case collection is provided, the default set will
            be used.

parameters.name: codec
parameters.summary:
A codec implementation that generated serializers will use for write operations. If no
            codec is provided, <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryCodec" /> will be used.

parameters.name: resolver
parameters.summary: A resolver to obtain type information from.
